review.comment_positive: My absolute favourite accommodation in my whole Vietnam tripğŸ’– ! The host family are the sweetest people and always welcomed me back with a delicious tea and fruit. review.comment_positive:
We've stayed in a good few places in Vietnam during our 1 month trip in the country and this has to best place we've stayed in. First of all really good value for money. Great and cute homestay in Hue. The owner and his family were so lovely and welcoming. The owner suggested good places for us to eat.


We got the room with separate living room/kitchen area which was really handy. There was a table, small cooker, utensils and fridge if you wanted to make something. The bedroom part itself was very cosy and comfortable. 

The homestay was in a really good area. The area was very lively with both locals and tourist, very close to restaurants, bars and shops although it was close to bars it was very quite as the accommodation was by the alleyway.

If you book with TÃ¢m Homestay I would highly suggest booking the room with the separate living/kitchen area. We will definitely be coming to stay here again if we ever come back to Hue!

review.comment_positive: What an excellent place to stay in HuÃ©! The location is perfect, being just a brief walk or ride from the imperial city and with plenty of restaurants less than a 2 minute walk away. The homestay is cute and extremely clean with comfortable rooms that hit the spot and are well decorated. It is the hospitality though that puts Tam Homestay over the top. It is truly exceptional. Each day, upon your return, you almost feel as if you are coming "home" as your excellent and genuinely kind hosts will greet you and offer you a cup of tea. They are right there to assist in offering umbrellas, restaurant recommendations, transportation options and more. We had a delightful time in Tam homestay and would ABSOLUTELY stay again. Cannot recommend highly enough. You will enjoy it!

Hosts: Incredibly kind and welcoming family. They helped us with everything like booking transport and tours. They also offered us thoughtful things like cold water and fresh fruit on arrival, they also sent us on a tour but made sure they sent with us hats, water and snacks. 

Conclusion: Excellent service, great facilities, perfect location. Weâ€™d happily stay again and highly recommend staying here!

review.comment_positive: La ubicaciÃ³n estÃ¡ bien, en una zona con muchos restaurantes. Hacen lavanderÃ­a por 25.000 dongs el kilo. La habitaciÃ³n era enorme y estaba muy limpia. El colchÃ³n era sÃºper cÃ³modo.

Al principio querÃ­a saber nuestros planes, pero era para vendernos excursiones, transporte y de todoâ€¦ no querÃ­a ni que usÃ¡ramos Grab. Te ofrecen tÃ© de manera insistente cada vez que entras por la puerta. Es un poco invasivo, ya que cuando vuelves de hacer cosas lo que quieres es irte a la habitaciÃ³n a descansar. La lavanderÃ­a te la devuelven con prendas aÃºn hÃºmedas y sin planchar. De hecho entraron a dejar el cesto a la habitaciÃ³n sin nuestro consentimiento, y la ropa nos la entregaron en recepciÃ³n cuando la pedimos. Pero lo peor de todo (aunque sea un mÃ­nimo gasto para nosotros) es que cuando fuimos a recoger las mochilas nos cobraron 3 botellas de agua del â€œminibarâ€. Â¿QuÃ© minibar? TenÃ­an 2 botellas de agua en la habitaciÃ³n y 4 en la nevera, y en ningÃºn lado anunciaba el precio del agua de la neveraâ€¦ evidentemente a 40 grados cogimos las frÃ­as. Pero repito, en ningÃºn sitio ponÃ­a precio ni nada, y un minibar no se compone jamÃ¡s de SOLO agua. AdemÃ¡s en otros comentarios hemos visto que a gente a la que ayudÃ³ con excursiones y transporte, les regalÃ³ agua para el camino. Por lo que intuyo y noto que nos cobrÃ³ el agua porque por narices nos querÃ­a sacar algo extra.

review.comment_positive: stayed at Tam homestay for three nights last week.first night stayed at deluxe double room with balcony,second and third night should stay at another room,but the host asked me if i can stay three night at the same room,cuz he said the price would be the same,i agreed with him.so this review is for deluxe double room with balcony.the room is clean,like home,the host stay with us,the living room is big,it has a kitchen,a bathroom and a balcony.the host,Tam is friendly and nice,will prepare drinks for you when you go back from outside.i booked a traditional singing on Huong River ticket from him, also booked one day private car tour and minibus to Hoi An(with tour), price are reasonable and cheaper than others.the location of the homestay is great,close to many eateries and shops,also close to walking street area and perfume river.the homestay is very quiet ,so you will have very good sleep every night. about breakfast ,there are many options to choose,but all are vegetarian food( some with eggs). will stay here again,Tam homestay is the best choice in Hue.

review.comment_positive: This place is a gem. It has a great location right in the heart of Hue but down a quiet alley.  It was a short walk to a bunch of restaurants; a couple of which the host provided us names of. We had a 1 bedroom with a kitchenette, table and balcony. The AC worked great in the bedroom. The hosts go out of their way to make you feel special. We were greeted with tea and fruit on arrival and thereafter every time we returned from sightseeing. We stayed for 3 nights and we always looked forward to coming back at the end of the day. The WIFI was great as well. Breakfast was good as well.

review.comment_positive:
Exceptional! We had such a warm and friendly welcome here, the hospitality was outstanding.
Communication was excellent for help with our arrival by train and and getting to the Homestay. As it's down an alleyway, cars cannot go down the last few meters, so we were met at the street to help with our luggage.
The room was very spacious with beautiful terrace, plenty of room for 3 of us. Location was excellent, very close to night walking street with bars and restaurants but quiet and when we were back in our room.
Breakfast was provided for a very small extra charge and we could choose the items we wanted to eat and drink.
We could not fault anything here, everything was spotlessly clean, it's in a great location but it felt homely and serene and the father and son hosts go out of their way to make you feel welcome!
We can definitely recommend staying here when in Hue!

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i CÃ³ Ban CÃ´ng
review.comment_positive: stayed here for three nights,when checked in,the host Tam welcomed me with fresh juice and fruits.the room i booked is big,actually i booked two different room,cuz the room type i preferred only available on the second and third day,so i booked another room on the first day.but the host asked me if i can stay at the same room,i really love that room,so agreed with him.the room is clean,full of Buddhist decor,beautiful,the dining room is big,cozy and it has a kitchen.but i was busy during the stay,no chance to use it.i only used the fridge inside the room.the room is comfortable, especially the bed,i had good sleeps here.the bathroom not big,but clean,the water pressure is strong,easy to use.though i never used hot water,but i did open it once,and it was hot.Tam,the host provided free mineral water everyday. every time when i returned,he will prepare juice and tea for me,he is very generous and nice.there are many options for the breakfast,i tried Hue veggies noodle soup,sautÃ©d noodles with eggs and omelette with banh mi.all come with fruit salad,about the drinks,i tried passion fruits juice,black cofee with ice and ginger tea.all were delicious and healthy.i love sautÃ©d noodles with eggs,it is called mi xao trung in vietnamese.on the third day.i ordered a private car with the host,visit three tombs and a museum at very reasonable price.on the last day,i booked a minibus to Hoi An from the host.Tam homestay though not a five star hotel,the host provide five star service,highly recommended!

review.comment_positive:
When it comes to memorable getaways, my recent stay at the hotel exceeded all expectations and left an indelible mark on my heart. From the moment I stepped through the grand entrance, I was met with a level of hospitality that instantly put me at ease.

The first thing that struck me was the hotel's immaculate ambiance. The lobby was beautifully adorned, showcasing a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and classic charm. The staff welcomed me with warm smiles and a genuine eagerness to assist, setting the tone for the entire stay.

I was greeted by a scene of absolute comfort and elegance upon entering my room. I booked one room with one bed, but instead, the owner gave me a bigger room with very big comfortable beds.  We stayed there only for two nights. On our last day, we needed to check out from the room in the morning but were allowed to stay in the backyard of the hotel and use the pool until the evening because we had a train at that time.
I had a free lesson on how to drive the motorbike provided by I suppose one of the owners of the hotel, for which I was very thankful. 

What truly set this hotel apart was its exceptional service. The staff's dedication to ensuring my stay was nothing short of perfect was evident throughout my visit.  
I will recommend this place always for staying.

We did inform the owner and he was concerned and respectful about the issue but did not know who would have taken it, so I would advise to keep valuables locked away or on you as there isnâ€™t a safe in the room to store them. Apart from this incident everything else was perfect.

The location is fantastic, it is in town but not close to the busy streets or noise, so perfect for relaxing in HuÃ©. The rooms are big, nice and comfortable, every detail of the room is very special and the owners have surely thought deeply of the best way to decorate the rooms to make you feel at home. You can really see the love and care that they put into the room. Everything is made out of bamboo, and it really gives a relaxing scene that makes all the difference.

Although we had little time in Hue, the owners were incredibly nice and helpful in our trip, recommending for us both the sightseeing to do during our stay and arranging for us the booking for the bus to our next destination. They also arranged for us the rent of a motorbike. You can feel in their smiles that they welcome guests wholeheartedly.

I strongly recommend that you look no further and stay at Tam Homestay.
